ignoreCommand: B=${BASE_BRANCH:-master};R="https://github.com/${VERCEL_GIT_REPO_OWNER}/${VERCEL_GIT_REPO_SLUG}.git";[ -n "$VERCEL_GIT_PULL_REQUEST_ID" ]&&git fetch --depth=1 "$R" "$B"&&git diff --quiet FETCH_HEAD HEAD -- sparkle/src||([ -n "$VERCEL_GIT_PREVIOUS_SHA" ]&&git diff --quiet "$VERCEL_GIT_PREVIOUS_SHA" "$VERCEL_GIT_COMMIT_SHA" -- sparkle/src||exit 1)
